349b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ngan 'das la myi reg stong par gnas pa med/ / gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// stong pa zhi pa'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'ang spyod pa// bar skabs der ni
349b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma bsgom par mi bya ste/ / mtshan ma med par gnas shing zhi la rab zhi spyod// bar snang 'phur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te// de na gnas pa ma yin sa la lhung mi 'gyur//
349b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgo spyod pa// mya ngan 'das la mi rig mtshan ma spyod ma yin// dper na 'bod bslabs skyes bus gyen du mda' 'phangs te// mda'
349b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan dag gis gcig nas gcig tu long btags nas/ / snga ma'i mda' de sa la ltung ba'i skabs mi byed// mi de 'dod na mda' de sa la lhung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes rab
349b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol phyin pa mchog spyod pa/ / shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam rgyu zhing // de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob mi
349b6(khri brgyad stong pa): byed/ / dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ nam mkhar gnas te cho 'phrul zung dag rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug
349b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ston/ / de ni ldog pa med cing de la skyo ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong gnas shing // ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol son la gnas med chu// 'gro ba/
350a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' yas ston// bskal pa bye bar nyams pa med cing skyo ba med// dper na mi 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing /
350a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lag pa gnyis kas gdug gnyis 'dzin cing ji mi snyam// dus min rlung gis g.yang sa chen por phul byas kyang // bdag nyid der ni gA yang du ltung bar 'gyur ba myed// de bzhin byang
350a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas/ / thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdug ni yongs gzung ste// chos rnams stong pa mtshan med smon pa med rtog cing // mya ngan
350a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das la reg pa med la chos kyang mthong / / dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste// rin chen rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong bar byed// ded dpon de ni de la bde bar 'tsho mod
350a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi/ / 'on kyang gnyen bshes tshogs kyi sdug bsngal yid la 'byung // de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rin chen gling song ste// byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa//
350a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mya ngan 'das la reg par mngon par dga' mod kyi// 'on kyang sdug bsngal sems can sdug bsngal yid la 'byung // tshong pa gang zhig grong khyer nang nas grong rdal dang // grong du bya ba'i phyir dang
350a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes par bya phyir 'gro/ / der yang mi gnas rin chen gling du'ang mi gnas la// mkhas pa khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas par 'gyur// de bzhin rang rgyal bcas pa'i nyan thos rnam grol shes//
350b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kun la byang chub sems dpa' gsal ba mkhas par 'gyur// de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// lam mkhas cho ga shes pa 'dus byas gnas mi 'gyur// gang tshe 'gro
350b2(khri brgyad stong pa): la byams pa rjes su 'brel byas nas/ / spyong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin spyod// gal te mya ngan 'das la reg byed de la med// de lta mod kyi de ni thob par byed kyang nus//
350b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin zhing // de ni ming gis gdags par bya bar nus pa ste// de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa// de ni ming gis gdags
350b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nus rnam pa gzhan du min/ / gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dris la// byang chub sems dpa' zab chos yongs su mi ston te// stong pa mtshan ma med dang mi ldog chos rnams kun// mi 'chad de ni
350b5(khri brgyad stong pa): lung bstan ma yin rig par bya/ / dgra bcom sa dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing // 'gro la chos ston mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
350b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong ba/ / de ni mo ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gcad smon lam btab// bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs
350b7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis me yi phung po zhi/ / de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// mi yi 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nad mang ba// phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhi// 'on kyang rlom
351a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa/ / de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// byang chub sems dpa' bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems sam// bden pa'i byin gyi
351a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rlabs kyis rnam pa grub med dam/ / pha rol lung bstan yin snyam rlom sems 'byung gyur na// rlom sems gnas pa de ni blo chung rig par bya// ming gi gzhi las bdud ni nye bar 'ongs gyur nas/
351a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes brgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin zhing // 'di ni khyod kyi sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming yin zhe 'am// sbyangs sdoms ci 'dra brtson pa rnal
351a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor ldan de la/ / khyed sngon yon tan tshul yang 'di zhes rjod byed de// de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rab tu dben
351a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang / / dgon pa dben pa nags khrod rab tu sten byed cing // bdag bstod gzhan la smon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung
351a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rig par bya/ / rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor grong rdal gnas byed cing // byang chub ldan pa sems can smin byed ma gtogs par// de ni dgra bcom rang rgyal dag la 'dod med pa// 'di ni bde bar
351a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa'i sras kyi dben pa gsungs/ / gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri yi su la// sbrul gyis gang bar lo mang bye bar gnas byed kyang // dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems
351b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' de/ / lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtan dang // stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'dzin slob rnams la/
351b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni dgon dben spyod pa min snyam sems byed pa// de ni dgon pa'i spyod yul min zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung // theg pa gnyis kyi/
351b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems bral byang chub mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag nyams gzhan ma yin// de lta bas na mkhas pas nga rgyal
351b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom byas te/ / bsam pa drag pos byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// nad pa shin tu gso phyir sman pa bsten pa ltar// g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub
351b5(khri brgyad stong pa): mchog zhug byang chub sem dpa' dag/ pha rol phyin dang mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes su bsten// de dag nan tan sa 'di rjes su ston pa yin// rnam pa gnyis kyis sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su rtog/
351b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcur gang bzhugs pa// kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin// pha rol phyin 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang sgron dang
351b7(khri brgyad stong pa): snang dang ston pa yin zhes bstan/ / ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtshan gyis stong // de ltar mtshan dang chos 'di thams cad su shes shing // chos rnams stong zhing mtshan nyid med par
352a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab shes na/ / de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// sems can zas dang 'dod la yongs su rtog byed cing // 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams
352a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rtag tu 'khor/ / bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yod min stong pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis bdag la nam mkha'i mdud 'di bcings// dper na dogs pas 'du shes kyis ni dug blangs pa/
352a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dug de lto bar song ba ma yin 'on kyang 'gyel// de ltar byis pa bdag dang bdag gyis khas blangs pa// 'du shes skyes pas 'chi yang rtag tu yod ma yin// ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas
352a4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyon mongs bstan/ / bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam pa dag par gsungs// 'di la nyon mongs rnam dag gang yang yod min par// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rol phyin pas
352a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rtogs/ / 'dzam gling ma lus dag na sems can ji snyed pa// de dag byams dang byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la// kun kyang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang
352a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chub rgyur sngo yang / / gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su mthun byed na// bsod nams de la sbyin pa'i phung pos char mi phod// de phyir
352a7(khri brgyad stong pa): g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya/ / shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// snying rje chen po bskyed cing sems can 'du shes med// de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi
352b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin gnas 'gyur/ / rtag tu yul 'khor bsod nams don yod yongs su spyod// lha mi sems can ring nas ngan song gsum 'brel ba// yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa'i byang
352b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' de/ / shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyin mtshan brtson byed pa// lam yang 'di ni sems can khams kyi 'babastegs ston// mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa yi rin
352b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chen mchog/ dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga' ba las// rnyed ma thag tu stor te bag med gyur pas na// stor bas sdug bsngal rtag tu rin chen mngon 'dod pa// de ltar
352b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen mtshungs pa yi/ / shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya// rin chen rnyed nas 'dzin par byed cing mi phyed na// rjes su 'dzin par byed
352b5(khri brgyad stong pa): cing myur du dbang du 'gyur/ / 'od zer 'phreng bas mun pas dkrugs pa'i mun nag kun// sel bar byed cing sprin med mkha' la nyi shar na// srog chags 'byung po'i srin bu me
352b6(khri brgyad stong pa): khyer thams cad dang / / skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis non// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa lta thibs
352b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sel byed cing / / 'gro ba kun dang dgra bcom rang rgyal zil gyis non// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa mtshan med yongs spyad phyir// dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don/
353a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor gyur te mngon par 'gro bya 'os// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can dga' byed na// thabs thob gyur nas rgyal srid gnas na smos ci
353a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dgos/ / de ltar spyod pa spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang phan brtson// chos kyi rgyal
353a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bor gan par gyur nas smos ci dgos/ / de yi tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// mya ngan sdug bsngal nyam thag mthu chung yid mi bde// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes
353a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jigs pa ston phyir phyogs rnams bsreg cing skar mda' gtong / / gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa rab ldan zhing // nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog don lta// rtag tu lus dang
353a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems ni mkha' 'gro bya ltar gyur/ / de la nag po'i rtsa lag glags rnyed ga la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsed gyur cing // phan tshun mi mthun khros pa'i sems
353a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan gyur pa/ / de yi tshe na bdud ni dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring du 'gyur// de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing shar 'dra bar 'gyur// de gnyis rang
353a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur/ / sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod// de ni bdud rnams dga' zhing bdud la thub mi 'gyur// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems
353b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' la la zhig/ lung bstan tho ba la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byed na// tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa// de skad bskal par phyir yang go cha bgo dgos so// sangs
353b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg/ de snyam sems shing ma legs snyam pa'i blo skyed de// so sor 'chag par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la// bral bar gyur pa de ni sangs
353b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas chos 'dir slob/ / gang zhig slob la bslob pa gang du slob med cing // slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs la// bslab dang bslab pa ma yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa//
353b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// byang chub sems dma' gang zhig bslab 'dir de ltar shes// de ni bslab pa nyams dang tshul khrims 'chal pa gzhar mi 'gyur//
353b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni nyes par byed cing sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// bslab pa mkhas shing dmigs pa med par gyur pas slob// mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyis shes rab de ltar spyod// dge ba ma yin
353b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems gcig tsam yang skyed mi byed/ / nyi ma par snang la ni 'gro bar byed pa na// 'od zer snang bas mdun na mun pa mi gnas bzhin// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bslab par byas rnams kyis/
353b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur// 'jig tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par 'gyur// dper na srog gi
354a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dbang po 'gags nas dbang po gzhan/ / gang dag ji snyed yod pa zad par 'gag par 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi// pha rol
354a2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nyan thos yon tan dang // rang rgyal yon tan kun la bslabs par gyur pa rnams// de dag de la mi gnas
354a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod pa mi skyed de/ / 'di ni bdag gi bslab bya yod snyam de phyir slob// mi ldog byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa yi// sems bskyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yi rang bas// stong gsum
354a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ri rab srang la gzhan nas tshad gzung rung / / rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni de ltar min// dge ba don gnyis thar 'dod sem can ji snyed pa// kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yi rang gyur//
354a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dephyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig ma rtog chos rnams kun// stong dang mtshan ma med
354a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par spros med yongs shes la/ / shes rab bsam pa thag pas byang chub mi tshol ba// rnal 'byor pa de shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// nam mkha'i khams dang khams gnyis tha dad
354a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur du ni/ / de dang de la gang phyir ces kyang bye brag me// de bzhin shes rab spyod ma khas byang chub sems dpa' yang // nam mkha' mtshungs shing dran pa nye bar zhi bar spyod// skye dro
354b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snyam du/ / skye bo 'di dag mgu bya mi sems bya ba med// g.yo sgyu sna tshogs rab tu ston pa de yang mthong // 'on kyang de la lus med sems med ming yang
354b2(khri brgyad stong pa): med/ / de bzhin shes rab spyod pa rnams kyang 'di snyam du// byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro ba yongs su sgrol mi sems// rang gi skye ba bya ba sna tshogs ldan pa'ang ston// sgyu ma lta
354b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bur rnam par rtog pa med par spyod/ / dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed// de ni ci zhig bya snyam du yang sems mi skyed// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub
354b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' yang / / sprul po sgyu ma gzhin du bya ba thams cad ston// shing mkhan zo bo mkhas pas shing gi 'khrul 'khor byas// skyes pa bud med 'dra ste bya ba thams cad byed//
354b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed// de ltar spyod mkhas rnams la lha tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar
354b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba 'dud cing phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed kyang // yon tan bsngags pa'i 'phreng bas yongs su brjod par mdzad/
354b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed zhing na sems can rnams// de kun bdud du gyur par yongs su brtag bzung ste// ba spu nyag ma re re ji snyed sprul byas kyang // de dag kun gyis mkhas
355a1(khri brgyad stong pa): la bar chad bya mi nus/ / rnam bzhis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stobs ldan pa// thub par dka' zhing bdud bzhis bskyod par mi nus te// stong
355a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par gnas dang sems can yongs su mi gtong dang / / ji skad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs byin bslabs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs yum shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di// 'chang
355a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing / / bsam pa thag pas bsgrub par mngon du brtson byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir mngon zhugs rig par bya// de bzhin nyid kyi
355a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas su chos dbyings nyer mi 'gro/ / dper na bar snang sprin ni gnas med gnas pa bzhin// rig sngags 'chang ba dmigs med nags sems mkha' 'gro tshe// me rtog shing phyir
355a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sngags kyi stobs kyi byin rlabs byed/ / de ltar spong pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// rtog par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur// 'chad par byed dang
355a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos nyid mthong ba mi dmigs pa/ / 'di ni zhi 'dod yon tan dga' ba'i gnas pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kyi dgra bcom rnam thar ma gtogs par// gnas pa 'di ni nyan thos
355a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rang rgyal bcas pa yi/ / gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pa// ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin// 'dab chags nam mkhar gnas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ma
355b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin/ / nya ni mun gnas kyang 'tshubs te 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan stobs dag gis// pha rol son pa stong gnas mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur//
355b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog 'gro gang 'dod pas// chos kyi sbyin pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin bya zhing // phan mdzad rnams kyi gnas pa mchog 'dir sten cig dang // sangs rgyas
355b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg 'gyur/ / bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa// bslab pa'i snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med// mkhas pa gang zhig bslab
355b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas/ / sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir slobs// chos mdzod dam pa 'di ni gter gyi phul du byung // 'jig rten dgun sangs rgyas rigs kyi ba
355b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sgyid mdzod/ / 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams// de dag 'di la byung ste chos dbyings zad mi 'gyur// shing dang 'bras bu me tog nags tshal ji snyed pa/
355b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag thams cad sa la yang dag byung zhing 'thon// 'on kyang sa la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// skyo ba med cing yongs su mi nyams rnam rtog med// sangs rgyas nyan thos rang rgyal bcas
355b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ji snyed dang / / 'jig rten kun na lha dang bde skyid chos yod pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // shes rab rnams kyang zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// sems
356a1(khri brgyad stong pa): can tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur ji snyed pa/ / de kun ma rig las byung bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rab tu
356a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byung / / 'khrul 'khor zad pa med cing ma rig 'phel ba med// ye shes tshul sgro thabs kyi rtsa ba ji snyed pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // rkyen rnams tshogs
356a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu byung / / shes rab pha rol phyin pa zad pa'am 'phel ba med// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung 'di// shes rab kyis
356a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ni 'byung med zad med rtogs pa de/ / dper na sprin gyis sgrib med nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar// ma rig 'gebs pa bsal nas rang byung thob par 'gyur// mthu chen ldan pa dag ni bsam
356a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan bzhir gnas kyang / / rten par byed pa ma ya ni gnas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan bzhi po 'di dag rten yin zhing // thob par gyur nas byang chub dam pa mchog
356a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang 'thob/ / shes rab mchog thob pa dag bsam gtan gnas pa myong // gzugs med ting 'dzin dam pa bzhi po rnams kyang myong // bsam gtan 'di dag byang chub mchog la
356a7(khri brgyad stong pa): phan byed gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa' zag pa zad phyir slob pa min// bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas mtshan ma med// de la gnas rnams gal te lus ni zhig gyur nas//
356b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye ste// 'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad byung zhing // dper na 'dzam gling mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa'i// lha yul lha yi khang pa/
356b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dam pa rnyed gyur cing // mthong nas de yis der ni yul rnams yongs bzung ba// de dag gnas par mi byed phyir yang 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
356b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mchog 'chang ba/ / rnal 'byor brtson pa bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin gnas nas// phyir yang 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te gos pa med// chu la pad+ma bzhin du byis pa'i chos mi
356b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas/ / sems can yongs su sman par bya dang zhing byung dang // pha rol phyin 'di yongs su rdzogs bya ma gtogs par// bdag nyid chen po gzugs med khams su skye mi byed//
356b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub yon tan pha rol phyin rnams nyams par 'gyur// dper na mi zhig rin chen gter rnams rnyed gyur cing // de la 'dod pa'i blo ni bskyed pa ma byas la// des kyang dus gzhan
356b6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig na de dag yongs blangs shing / / blangs nas khyim du bcug ste chags par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas bsam gtan bzhi// ting 'dzin zhib
356b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' bde sbyin byed thob gyur la/ / bsam gtan bde dang bsam gtan ting 'dzin thob btang ste// 'gro la snying brtse ldan pa phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub
357a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' ting 'dzin bsam gtan gnas/ / dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo skyed na// mnyam par ma bzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs
357a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur pa ste/ / sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams mnyan pa gru zhig bzhin// gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro// reg dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la brtson
357a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur kyang / / dgra bcom rang rgyal theg zlal byang chub sems dga' na// dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam gzhag yin par shes par bya// sems can rnams dag sems can gang bag
357a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan gyi phyir/ / brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la brtson zhing rnam par rgyu// dper na bran mo bum thogs dbang med rje bo'i dbang // de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun
357a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi dbang gis 'gro/ / smyo ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brdegs kyang rung // bran mo rje bo la ni zlog pa'i tshig mi smra// bdag la des na gnod pa byas su 'ong snyam nas// shin
357a6(khri brgyad stong pa): tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs pas zil gyis non/ / de bzhin byang chub ched du byang chub mchog zhugs pa// 'gro ba kun la bran gyur de bzhin gnas par bya// lung
357a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gi yon tan rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs mi byed/ / shing las me byung ba yis shing de bsregs pa bzhin// bdag gi bde ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis// sems can
357b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par brtson/ / bu gcig pa la ma ni rim gro byed pa ltar// bsam pa thags pas byed de skyo med gnas pa bzhin// sems can don dang
357b2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing sbyong brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ / gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod sems shing // skyo ba'i blo ni rdul tsam skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de ni g.yel med brtson 'grus
357b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol phyin la brtson/ / byang chub sems dpa' me mkhas bskal pa bya grangs la// gal te ring bar 'dus shes sdug bsngal byang chub sgrub// chos sgrub byed pa'i tshe na rab
357b4(khri brgyad stong pa): tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ / de tshe brtson 'grus pha rol phyin nyams le lo can// zhi ba bla na med pa thob par bya snyam ste// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed thog mar
357b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed byas nas/ / nyin dang mtshan du de la yid gcig gnas byed pa// mkhas pa gsal ba brtson 'grus brtsams par rig par bya// gal te la la 'di skad ri rab
357b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ri ba shig la/ / phyi nas byang chub mchog thob bya zhes smras pa las// gal te skyo ba'i blo skyes ched du byed gyur na// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' le lo rnyed par 'gyur// ci ste
357b7(khri brgyad stong pa): cung zad 'di lta ci smos blo skyes te/ / skad cig tsam la ri rab thal bar rlag snyam na// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste// ring por mi thogs
358a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dren par byang chub thob par 'gyur/ / yongs su smin par byas la 'gro ba'i don bya zhes// gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byed na/
358a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa le lo rnyed 'gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring 'gyur gnam sa bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med//
358a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes rnam par log nas chos gnyis mi spyod pa// 'di ni byang chub ma nyams mchog zhi tshol ba yi// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs// gzhan
358a4(khri brgyad stong pa): las ngan du brjod pa'i tshig rtsub thos gyur nas/ / su smra su thos gang nas su yi gang btang zhes// ma lus mgu byed byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de// bzod pa'i pha
358a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol phyin dang ldan pa mdzangs pa yin/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bzod pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig stong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas
358a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang dgra bcom rang rgyal phul byas pa/ / sbyin pa'i phung pos de yi bsod nams char mi phod// bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongs su dag 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis
358a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan dang mthu stobs pa mtha' yas/ / sems can rnams la dad pa'i chos rab sgrog par byed// bzod pa mkhas la 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur// gal te sems
358b1(khri brgyad stong pa): can la las tsan dan snyim bkang ste/ / bla ma 'phangs pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang // gzhan zhig me mngag mgol 'thor ba gnyis ka la// de yis mnyam
358b2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing snyoms pa'i yid ni bskyed par bya/ / byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas// sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngos na// dpa'
358b3(khri brgyad stong pa): po bzod pas 'jig rten kun na dgra bcom dang / / rang rgyal sems can khams kyi bzod kun zil gyis non// bzod byed 'di snyam du yang sems ni bskyed bya ste// sems
358b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal mang / / 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis mi 'dod gnod myong na// byang chub ched du ci phyir da bzod mi bya snyam// lcag dbyig mtsho/
358b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang gsad dang bcing dang rdeg pa dang // mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gcod dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed bdag gis bzod snyam pa// byang chub sems
358b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas/ / zhi ba 'dod pa rnams ni khrims kyis byung ba yin// stobs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims nyams pa med// sdom
358b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i bya ba ji snyed kun gyi rjes su 'jug/ sems can kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub sngo// gal te rang rgyal dgra bcom byang chub 'dod skyed na// tshul khrims 'chal
359a1(khri brgyad stong pa): cing tshul mkhas de bzhin spyod pa nyams/ / ci ste byang chub zhi ba mchog tu yongs sngon// 'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol byin la gnas// chos
359a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gang nges pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byung med pa/ / de ni yon tan chos don ldan pa'i tshul khrims yin// chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa// 'di ni tshul khrims
359a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'chal ces rnam par 'dren pas gsungs/ / gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod la// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste// sangs rgyas
359a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed pa/ / mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya// gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu// spyod cing rang rgyal dgra bcom
359a5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid la 'dod skyed na/ / de tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems bskyed de ni phas pham pas kyang shing tu lci// tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs
359a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sngo la/ / de yis rlom sems med de bdag bstod mi byed cing // nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs spangs pa// tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas byang chub sems dpa'
359a7(khri brgyad stong pa): brjod/ / gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal ces// sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul
359b1(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims 'tshal/ / tshul khrims nyams shing de la longs dag tshul khrims med// gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes 'dod chags bral la
359b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sdom pa ci phyir med/ / gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom sems med// 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs// sems can dag pa gang zhig 'di
359b3(khri brgyad stong pa): lha'i khrims ldan pa/ / sdug dang mi sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin// mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med// bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu
359b4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhen pa med/ / chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma brlar shes nas// bdag gi sha yang gtong zhing zhen pa'i sems med na// de las phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos
359b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ci dgos/ / gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas min te// bdag dang bdag gir dngos por 'du shes 'dod chags 'gyur// blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lha ga la yod//
359b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ser sna yi dgas gnas su skye bar byed pa ste// ci ste mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul zhes na// gtong la
359b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lkug par gtong / / gling bzhi logs par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra// byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de ltar min// byang
360a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba sbyin byin na/ / srin pa gsum gyi sems can ji snyed pas ma byas te// de dag kun la sbyin 'di byin par gyur
360a2(khri brgyad stong pa): cig sems/ / de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog tu sngo// sbyin pa byin nas dngos por gnas par byed pa med// de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba med// de ltar
360a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gtong ba mkhas la thams cad gtong ba ste/ / chung ngu gtang la dpag tu med pa mang por 'gyur// srid pa gsum na sems can ma lus ji snyed pa// yongs su brtag pa gzung
360a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ste de dag thams cad kyis/ / 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na// byang chub sems dpa'
360a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis/ / de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos por yi rang nas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs spro na// yongs su sngo bas 'gro/
360a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba thams cad zil gyis non// nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang // rin chen bai DUR+Ya gcig de kun zil gyis non// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun// rjes
360a7(khri brgyad stong pa): su yi rang byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non/ / gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin byin na// de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po 'phangs med na// de las dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel
360b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur te/ / sprin med zla ba yar ngo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byang chub sems dpas sbyin pas yi dgas 'gro ba gcod// dbul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod// rnam par rgyu tshe longs
360b2(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod mtha' yas yangs pa 'thob/ / sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can sbyin pas yongs smin byed// khrims kyis dud 'gro 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo spong // dus rnams kun tu mi khom brgyad kyang rnam par spang //
360b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bzod pas gzugs bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te// gser mdog sdug cing 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bang mdzod ye shes mtha' yas
360b4(khri brgyad stong pa): thob par 'gyur/ / bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa 'dor// rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes rab kyis ni chos kyis rang bzhin yongs shes na// ngan song gsum po'i khams
360b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gsum dag las shin tu 'da'/ / mi yi 'dren pa'i 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas na// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'gro la chos kyang ston// chos ni yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de// yongs dag zhing dang
360b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can dag pa yongs su 'dzin/ / sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin// de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin// byang chub lam 'di shes rab bstan phyir brjod pa ste// 'jig
360b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rten dag na nad gso byed pa sman pa'i mchog/ ming ni yon tan thams cad sdud pa'i byang chub lam// lam 'di sems can thams cad kyis ni thob gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sdud pa
361a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bam po lnga
361a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
361a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
361a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par smad pa spod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs
361a5(khri brgyad stong pa): su btsal bar bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
361a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rtag tu ngu des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na/ ji ltar yongs su btsal ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
361a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na/ lus la ched cher ma 'dzin
361b1(khri brgyad stong pa): srog la mi lta/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal bas yongs su btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog
361b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na/ bar snang las smra thos par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa
361b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mi skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / nyin mo
361b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song zhig/ nang dang phyi rol gang la'ang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu
361b5(khri brgyad stong pa): g.yas g.yos su ma blta bar song zhig/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams su'ang ma blta bar song zhig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma
361b6(khri brgyad stong pa): g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig/ gang las
361b7(khri brgyad stong pa): g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ / ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur
362a1(khri brgyad stong pa): @pa de ni 'khor ba la spyod do/ / gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob bo// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
362a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ sgra de la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
362a3(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad bslab par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rtag tu ngu legs so legs so//
362a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang sgra thos te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la
362a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mos pa bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya// sems can du lta ba yongs su spang
362a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang /
362a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya'o// bsnyen pa kun bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi
362b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i las la yod pa thos pas 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la/ rigs kyi bu khyod
362b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar byas te/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/
362b3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
362b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin shegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi lom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob
362b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang
362b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis/ dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar
362b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o/ / khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro
363a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub te/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing bsten pa
363a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / bsnyen par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi//
363a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so// 'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ chos 'di dag la rten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyis/
363a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa med kyis/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor rtog par bya'o// rigs
363a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
363a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ zag cha lta bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar
363a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te
363b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyes par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang
363b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/
363b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sgra de la rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam nas/ des
363b4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de sme zhing 'dug go/ de sa phyogs de na nyin zhag gicig 'das par byed/ nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bdun 'das kyang // shes rab kyi
363b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur kyi bar du/ lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi skyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa ma skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi
363b6(khri brgyad stong pa): skyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig
363b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang
364a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'byung ngo / / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam
364a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang ma 'byung ngo / / rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshe
364a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smras pa legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis de ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin
364a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gags pa dag 'atsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sngan byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol sa sbyin pa yongs su btsal to// rigs kyi bu na
364a5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / don du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing / shar phyogs nyid du song zhig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan
364a6(khri brgyad stong pa): spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang shing ta la'i 'phreng rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshur dpag tshad
364a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor
364b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyams ming ba dang / bar bar dag tu'am pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor lug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun legs par byas shing bskor la/
364b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes
364b3(khri brgyad stong pa): te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang / rin po che'i tha byung ba mda' yab cig shos gzhan dang 'brel ba/ grong khyer
364b4(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga
364b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam
364b6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing snyar la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ spa des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de'i khor lug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / rlu ha cang yang mi grang / ha cang mi dro
364b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bas gang bdag yod do/ / chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa rin po che sna bdun gyi gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs ras rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o// chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pal
365a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhim pa'i ngad dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
365a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las/ de na med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/
365a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod pa/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin
365a4(khri brgyad stong pa): po che sna bdun gyi me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing / me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po
365a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i pang lo tsam ste/ sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung
365a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 2/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do// rdzing bu de dag thams cad
365a7(khri brgyad stong pa): na dang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka ran da dang / gzhan sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing / rigs su gcad pa med de/ 'di ltar sems
365b1(khri brgyad stong pa): can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer
365b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mngon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta
365b3(khri brgyad stong pa): na sdug pa/ rab rim bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod do// khang pa de na khang pa'i long spyod du rtag tu rab dag zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang /
365b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang / rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog
365b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ldan zhes bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing du de dag gi
365b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ ngos gnyis ni dngul las byas/ ngos gsum ni bai DUR+Ya las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi la ni ke ke ru la byas pa'i bye ma brdal ba ste/ rdzing bu
365b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag re re la'ang thes skas them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa
366a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag skyes so/ / rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pal dang / pad+mo dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing / ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / bzhad rnams
366a2(khri brgyad stong pa): skang 'byin to/ / rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du ltung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu
366a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'ang tsan dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan no/ / der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang
366a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sngar zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing
366a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste dga' mgur spyod
366a6(khri brgyad stong pa): cing / de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang / grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
366a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan nang tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi
366b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog kha
366b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing / sa phyogs de'ang spos sna tshogs dang / 'dug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug
366b3(khri brgyad stong pa): nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag de lta bur gus par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan
366b4(khri brgyad stong pa): to/ / de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang / mi dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po// srog chags stong phrag mang po/ srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las/ la la ni klog slob/ la la ni 'dzin/
366b5(khri brgyad stong pa): la la ni 'chad/ kha cig ni zlos/ la la ni lung nod/ la la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtog par byed de/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang
366b6(khri brgyad stong pa): log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i
366b7(khri brgyad stong pa): drung du song zhig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
367a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu des
367a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma gcad pa song zhig dang / ring por mi
367a3(khri brgyad stong pa): thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgur yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing
367a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyes kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug
367a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang / gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed
367a6(khri brgyad stong pa): cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do//
367a7(khri brgyad stong pa): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di/
367b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya
367b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes
367b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
367b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
367b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i
367b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang / 'bru dang / 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma khengs pa
367b7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting
368a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / ming dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib
368a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
368a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs
368a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa
368a5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po
368a6(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa tho
368a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag
368b1(khri brgyad stong pa): med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
368b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i
368b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya
368b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par mazhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
368b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
368b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung bar mdzad de/ tshig 'di dag kyang gsungs
368b7(khri brgyad stong pa): so/ / rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal to// yongs su tshol ba na'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag
369a1(khri brgyad stong pa): thob nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo /
369a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ byang chub tu spyod pa 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
369a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi
369a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs
369a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang / yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi
369a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang chad gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis
