375a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tu ma mchis pa las tha ba bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
375a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba su'ang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhi yid mi bde nas/ mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/ des nga'i lus
375a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'tshong bar 'dod na lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis
375a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur sti bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
375b1(khri brgyad stong pa): nide las rag las pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/ nga mchod sbyin zhig
375b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa der/ mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma sad pa de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras pas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag
375b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzags/ brla'i sha btogs te/ rus pa gcog tu song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang rkang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog
375b4(khri brgyad stong pa): na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar
375b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
375b6(khri brgyad stong pa): nga ni dbul te/ nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do zhes mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
375b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mchod par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis 'di skad bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa 'am
376a1(khri brgyad stong pa): khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur
376a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ro/ / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas/ 'di
376a3(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu dka' bar bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtod na/
376a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces
376a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyis so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i nor
376a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mang po dag khyod la sbyin no/ / bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par
376a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi'o/ / gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyi shing mchis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po bdag la stsal du
376b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyid do// // 'phags pa shes rab
376b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas bu mo de'i pha mas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan
376b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa las na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
376b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod nged kyis gnang gis/ bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gros
376b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ngeded 'gro ba'i skabs bye zhig/ de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces
376b6(khri brgyad stong pa): smras so/ / bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang bar chad mi bgyid do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan// bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to// rgyan gyis
376b7(khri brgyad stong pa): brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ 'dug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs/ gser dang
377a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi me tog dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
377a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / shar phyog ga la
377a3(khri brgyad stong pa): der logs su dong ste/ mthar gyis song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba blta na sdug pa las
377a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byas pa/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'o bas rim bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshur dpag tshad bcu gnyis// zheng du
377a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtamA pa/ khyogs
377a6(khri brgyad stong pa): khri nyams ming ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi mngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khril 'dug pa 'khor
377a7(khri brgyad stong pa): brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge
377b1(khri brgyad stong pa): slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ / de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du/ byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po ches
377b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyam nas/ de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag mnyam du shing rta de las babs so// de nas byang chub sems
377b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
377b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo / / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las
377b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byas pa/ tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig gis dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhin nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron me'i bya ba byed do//
377b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do// khang
377b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs pa de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas/ de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs ba ma la/ bai DUR+Ya bzhubs
378a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
378a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i
378a3(khri brgyad stong pa): me tog man da ra dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i dngul sil ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo // lha'i sil snyan dag kyang
378a4(khri brgyad stong pa): thos so/ / mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu dus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyod lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag dang / rin
378a5(khri brgyad stong pa): po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man dar dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la
378a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces spras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
378a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
378b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du 'thob par 'gyur ba yin na khyod mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
378b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhug/
378b3(khri brgyad stong pa): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de khang pa brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu pas bris pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rgya bdun gyis btab
378b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nas bzhag ste/ nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka' 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs
378b5(khri brgyad stong pa): nas/ de dag gis me tog dang / me tog 'phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
378b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
378b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang / moto//
379a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dam la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
379a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang /
379a3(khri brgyad stong pa): me tog 'breng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par
379a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khang pa brtseg pa zhig tu gyur to//
379a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gser dang dngul gyi me tog dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor bar 'dug par
379a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul
379a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / de ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che
379b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ rigs kyi bu ring byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dran/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ci 'dra bar
379b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur snyam mo/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'basnga la dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ de dag thams
379b3(khri brgyad stong pa): cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa la 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
379b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur
379b5(khri brgyad stong pa): cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
379b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bo chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du
379b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs
380a1(khri brgyad stong pa): su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so//
380a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub
380a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes byed cing
380a4(khri brgyad stong pa): thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
380a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
380a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba der logs su mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchis par bgyi/ su las shes
380a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/ des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas
380b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bsal sems pa nis byung gi/ gzhan dun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ di srid du mchi b.rabakyi bdang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur/
380b2(khri brgyad stong pa): del ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan
380b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag
380b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gis 'di thos nas ji ltar gtams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la bde logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes
380b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ga dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so//
380b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de nyan pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbug dbyung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs sa
380b7(khri brgyad stong pa): legs so/ / khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes/ de bzhin gshegs
381a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/
381a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis
381a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du
381a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdaga' dri na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin
381a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gsheg pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa 'tshal cing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ra 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
381a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ rtag par rab tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang
381a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid
381b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i
381b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ ji lta
381b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog
381b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bal 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
381b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
381b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam/ gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi
381b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyi mas gdungs pas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la/ nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/ der chu btung ngo de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems te/ chu de gang nas 'ongs//
382a1(khri brgyad stong pa): @gang dusong // chu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgyamatsho'as/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsha'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du stong / rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sdig N+ya
382a2(khri brgyad stong pa): la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu mi nyi mas gdungs shing / byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis
382a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la chur 'du shes bskyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la
382a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog go/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams
382a5(khri brgyad stong pa): cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/ dper na mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur
382a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am/ bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu
382a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma sprul pa glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tsho gas sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
382b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sku la'ang byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gas/ gnyigs ga dul ya bzhi'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu'am//
382b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las/ sad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
382b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam ya chos gang yang grub pa mi gda' 'o// rmi lam ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma lags so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rig kyi
382b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
382b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bstan par mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming dang mtshan gyi sku dang gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhi
382b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa'i so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug par dong ba/ 'dong pa/ 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol
382b7(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ / de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
383a1(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mi lam lta bu'o/ / zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan par shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go/
383a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dag chos nyid la'ang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rang
383a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tu shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par mi rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
383a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi
383a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin gnas so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'on
383a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin mod kyi/ rgyu dang /
383a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rkyen dang / gzhi la rag khas pa yin te brten nas byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyeni de dag yod na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyeran de dag med na
383b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do// sangs
383b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon spyod pas yongs su grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa sngon gyi 'phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen
383b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams yod na sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub par yang mi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa'ang gang
383b4(khri brgyad stong pa): du'ang mi 'gro/ gang du'ang mi 'pho ste/ brten nas 'byung ba rgyu la rag las/ rkyen la rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu la brten rgyu rten
383b5(khri brgyad stong pa): la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas/ pi wang de las sgra byung ste/ sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten la sa pa
383b6(khri brgyad stong pa): byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sba ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgra grag ya/ sgra de 'gag pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
383b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis
384a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las 'byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang
384a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis
384a3(khri brgyad stong pa): shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
384a4(khri brgyad stong pa): des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung
384a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul
384a6(khri brgyad stong pa): to/ / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing spa bkong bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
384a7(khri brgyad stong pa): cad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char
384b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag kyang bab bo/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po bzhi dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du la/ lha'i tsan dad gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gi 'thor/ mngon
384b2(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang / don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ gang
384b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dzer to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
384b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma
384b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byon mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgyad khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
384b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
384b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas/ sems can 'di sde
385a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi dan byas par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / nyid kyis bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsab mchog gis blan med
385a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tsom mi bya'o/ / bdag ni the tsom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa
385a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam
385a4(khri brgyad stong pa): du sems so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de la
385a5(khri brgyad stong pa): lha'i me tog man dar bdag byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod yongs su gzung ba yin
385a6(khri brgyad stong pa): te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir/ ji ltar khyod spobar byed pa de lta bur bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed
385a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka' 'o zhes smras so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
385b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bka ba ste/
385b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang zham ring bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gi lus khyod la dbul lo// de bdag gi lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag
385b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo do dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
385b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
385b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rnams la bkur stir bgyid/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag khyed kho bo
385b6(khri brgyad stong pa): la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyod kho bos blang ngo // bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes
385b7(khri brgyad stong pa): su mthun par 'jug go/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyad
386a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas/ de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag
386a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag kyang yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs
386a3(khri brgyad stong pa): so legs so/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
386a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de ltar na chos smra ba bdag la mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
386a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
386a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga
386a7(khri brgyad stong pa): brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu phul byin no//
386b1(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag/
386b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tungu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa 'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi cha la/ 'di ni ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
386b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
386b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha
386b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog
386b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pas byung / zol brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam sdang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems
386b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi/ leg par byugs
387a1(khri brgyad stong pa): me tog sna tshogs gasgyur te/ sa phyogs kyang du byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas parab tu ston pa
387a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur ba de legs par byug par bye'o snyam so/ / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su thob cing / spyod las gnyis kyis dus
387a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das par byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
387a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes grags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de
387a5(khri brgyad stong pa): thos pa dang / dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras
387a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pabashams so/ / de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos bud de/ spyan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo //
387a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
387b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tu du chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu/
387b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chu 'tshol na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus las khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
387b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig
387b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni sla'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma
387b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rung ngo snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag gdab
387b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang / mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang
387b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rang ga migags patshugs dacag cag te/ gnapapa nga rdzog sa kyis dag pa'i phyogs kyi nga rgya mags rnyed par mi 'gyur bas kyang chub sems da' sa dang chen ga sum
388a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ngag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang
388a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta/
388a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar
388a4(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam du sems so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs so// lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug
388a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tu dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar dris khyab bo/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so leg so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam
388a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis mi khyab bo/ / khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do// rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i
388a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
388b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag bdar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gis
388b2(khri brgyad stong pa): me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba dang / me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du
388b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dral 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man da ra ba 'di dag long la/ khyod kyis
388b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog 'akras par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig ces/ des de la lha'i me tog man da ra
388b5(khri brgyad stong pa): khal stong byin do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus ma tog de dag rdzas te/ me tog pa cig gis nis phyogs der me tog 'gram pa byas so// me ga kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'
388b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lag u0f7f/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las 'angs te/ chos kyi spyan ga
388b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mad pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong zag dums yongs su 'askor cing mdun gyis bzlas nas shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa ston te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dag
389a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhi
389a2(khri brgyad stong pa): du bde ba de lta bu thob bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes ragyi
389a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do//
389a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do// chos
389a5(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/ shes
389a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med
389a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba nyid do/ / rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/ shes
389b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do/ / gzugs mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med
389b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pab nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid/
389b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
389b4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmig
389b5(khri brgyad stong pa): su med pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha
389b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do/ / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub
389b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
390a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
390a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med
390a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa
390a4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i
390a5(khri brgyad stong pa): khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya/
390a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya
390a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de
390b1(khri brgyad stong pa): la sog pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa drug par// rab 'byor
390b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyog dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtsham dang / 'og dang / steng gi
390b3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham+ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sem dpa'i tshogs
390b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis mdun du bltas te/ tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na da lta ra stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
390b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di na chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sem dpa'i cho ga kyis mdun gyis brnyas nas/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
390b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'chad pa bzhin no/ / de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to// skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang
390b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du gyur pa de dang de dag tu skye ste/ tha na rmi kham durang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur te/ des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs// dal ba phun sum chog/
391a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ni bsgrubs so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sebra dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig
391a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya'o/ / rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyad par bya'o//
391a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongasasu gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig/
391a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rmongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan
391a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya// bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya// gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gle ga ba ma chen po la yi gegs pa zhing
391a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab tu gsal ba leg par bris te/ me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da dang / khor khor yug tu mar me'i 'breng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang
391a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pos bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i gdam ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sem/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa'i
391b1(khri brgyad stong pa): nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad
391b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byam pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas
391b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rim gro byas so/ / kun dga' bo de lta bas na da lta nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis 'phadra pa dang / dad pa dang / gus par byas pa de bzhin du/ nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byos
391b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do// rjes su yongs su gtad
391b5(khri brgyad stong pa): do/ / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten du ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshes pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston par rig par bya'o//
391b6(khri brgyad stong pa): kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / yi ge/
391b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po
392a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan
392a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan
392a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
392a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya yan chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra
392a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// shes rab kyi
392a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa rdzogs so//
